column4: I have a desperate network problem I must fix. Here is what I get from /tc/init.d/networking restart * reconfiguring network interfaces... rtnetlink no such process. What can I do about it
I have a desperate network problem I must fix. Here is what I get from /tc/init.d/networking restart * reconfiguring network interfaces... rtnetlink no such process. What can I do about it
does the networking still come up, or does it actually fail?
- Otherwise, there may just be items in the if-up and if-down scripts that are failing, but not causing the restart to actually "fail".
